User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://getyovids.com/sitemap.xml

# Crawl delay (optional - be respectful to server)
Crawl-delay: 1

# Disallow admin or private areas (if any)
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /private/

# Allow all downloader and converter pages
